update ums_education_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_id = #{oldId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, court_no = #{courtNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, court_code = #{courtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_education_background = #{nEducationBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_major = #{nMajor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_major = #{cMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_college = #{cCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_graduate_date = #{dGraduateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, n_present_info = #{nPresentInfo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_educate_form = #{nEducateForm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_study_form = #{nStudyForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_school_type = #{nSchoolType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_entry_date = #{dEntryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, n_duration = #{nDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_award_unit = #{cAwardUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_sync = #{nSync,jdbcType=INTEGER}, record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_school_country = #{nSchoolCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_enter_court_edu_bg = #{nEnterCourtEduBg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_education_background_report = #{nEducationBackgroundReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT date_format(d_graduate_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS d_graduate_date, date_format(d_entry_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS d_entry_date, c_college, c_major, n_education_background, n_educate_form, (CASE n_educate_form WHEN 1 THEN '全日制教育' WHEN 2 THEN '在职教育' END) AS n_educate_form_text, (select u.code_name from ums_code u where u.id=e.n_education_background and u.type_id='11') as n_education_background_text FROM ums_education_info e WHERE e.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
